lines.text: I was just a kid when I first got to see Muhammad Ali. I saw the way people looked up to him, saw their smiling faces. And I said to myself 'That's what I wanna be, I wanna be champ of the world'.

[to a young Mike Tyson]
Don't be scared of going into a fight, it's when you're AIN'T scared, that's the time to worry, because fear is the friend of every good and reasonable athlete.
they both fear dying and getting hurt. It's what the hero does that makes him a hero. And what the other doesn't do, makes him a coward.
I already trained two world champions. You're gonna tell me what to do?
never, under no circumstance, never call a colored woman the C word.
You allow yourself to be distracted, you allow yourself to fail. Everybody get back to your work.

Hey, you know what's going to happen if you lose tonight? Do ya? That little girlfriend of yours is gonna go home and fuck right over there and she's gonna do all kinds of nasty things all night long with him. And you know why? Because she's here...
Because she's here for the champ. She's ain't here for Iron Mike. She's here for the champ. And she don't care what the fuck his name is so long as people call him champ.
Y'all make me sick! Especially you, you fucking cunt!
You've got ten seconds to knock me the fuck out.
Rocky Marciano never allowed himself the thought of losing, he never imagined it.
Why dont you take a walk you fucking leach, Mr. 250-thousand-a-year friend?
